trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Yawningway needs help gathering the Carrotorium's Loporrits for mealtime.
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_TODO_00<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “carrot of happiness” to call over the Loporrits.
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Yawningway.
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_YAWNINGWAY_000_000<tab>Oh, bother... <yawn> There's no sign of any of them, and it's almost time to eat.
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_YAWNINGWAY_000_001<tab>Mmm, you there... If you happen to be heading to the Carrotorium, could you let my fellows know it's mealtime? If we don't eat, I can't take my nap...
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_YAWNINGWAY_000_002<tab>Many thanks... <yawn> They should come running at the mention of carrots of happiness, so just say those three magic words and they'll be on their way.

TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_YAWNINGWAY_000_004<tab>My friends aren't wont to refuse a well-prepared carrot─especially when it's a carrot of happiness. The mere mention should have them hopping back here in no time...
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>carrot of happiness

TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter any phrase containing the words “carrot of happiness” to call out to the Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_LOPORRITSA04241_000_020<tab>Take the square root of the roots and you get...
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_LOPORRITSA04241_000_021<tab>Carrots of happiness, you say? My, is it that time already?

TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_LOPORRITSA04241_000_022<tab>I was working out projections for optimal carrot production based on the total population of Etheirys to ensure that─ Oh, never mind. I must make haste, or I'll miss out on seconds!
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_LOPORRITSB04241_000_030<tab>Oh my whiskers, a visitor from Etheirys! What do I do? What do I say? ...And have you brought any snacks?
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_LOPORRITSB04241_000_031<tab>Could that mean... Yes, it must be time to eat at last!
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_LOPORRITSB04241_000_032<tab>Oh, how I have waited for this moment! There's nothing like a carrot of happiness to fill the void in one's belly and soul...
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_LOPORRITSC04241_000_040<tab>O carrot, my carrot, the prize we sought is won...
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_LOPORRITSC04241_000_041<tab>Wh-Wh-Whaaat!? They're serving carrots of happiness today?
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_LOPORRITSC04241_000_042<tab>The deep, luscious orange... That tempting, slender silhouette... Wait for me, my darlings─I'm coming for you!
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_YAWNINGWAY_000_050<tab>Ah, you've returned... <yawn> And everyone else is accounted for. Sustenance is essential for us Loporrits...though I suppose people are the same.

TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_YAWNINGWAY_000_051<tab>In any case, we expend a lot of effort in raising a whole variety of carrots. Carrots of happiness are a new cultivar that are particularly...<yawn>...comforting, though.
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_YAWNINGWAY_000_052<tab>Mmm...it seems almost silly to have our workers consume so many carrots just so that we can produce more carrots...
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_YAWNINGWAY_000_053<tab>...But that's a problem that can be solved with even more carrots!
TEXT_AKTKZE002_04241_YAWNINGWAY_000_054<tab>No need to worry about the details─I'll work out the figures just as soon as...<yawn>... Hmm, what were we talking about?
